table.title: USB3.2 Gen2x1, Gen1x1 Internal Cable With Redriver Topology Notes

entry.p: This assumes internal cable insertion loss of ~3 dB @ 5 GHz. Refer to USB3.2 "Front-Panel Internal Cable And Connector White Paper" for more details.

Note1*: Max/ min routing length for USB3.2 Gen1 & 2 speeds (5/ 10 Gbps) depends on redriver performance and its loss compensation capability when used in conjunction with Intel CPU. Work with repeater vendor to ensure the selected part can provide adequate signal integrity at the CPU.
Work with the vendor to ensure that the maximum via count is met
Work with the vendor to ensure that the maximum via count is met
